videoData.title: Where are our digital ads really going?
videoData.socialTitle: Where are our digital ads really going?

nodes.whoTheyAre: Kristi Rogers is a core member of BCG’s Technology, Media and Telecommunications practice. Prior to joining BCG, Rogers spent eight years at Philips working in the US and Europe to build her career in corporate finance and consumer goods, last holding roles as Finance Director for Central and Eastern Europe and Lean Six Sigma Black Belt. She holds a BA from the University of Washington and an MBA from New York University.

videoData.description: Imagine a world in which every ad you saw was relevant -- where advertising wasn't random or intrusive, but rather a carefully thought out combination of products you already wanted to know about. In this talk, advertising researcher Kristi Rogers describes how involving advanced mathematics in marketing will ultimately transform the way we interact with products, and the way brands interact with us.
videoData.socialDescription: Imagine a world in which every ad you saw was relevant -- where advertising wasn't random or intrusive, but rather a carefully thought out combination of products you already wanted to know about.
